Rock Beach in White Town, Puducherry(4.6⭐)
As the name suggests, this rocky beach is perfect for idling, watching the waves crash against the rocks, and shooting memorable photos. You can also satiate hunger pangs at the nearby cafes.
Best time to visit– November to March
How to reach:
• By Air: Puducherry Airport is 7 km away. You can take a taxi or auto from there.
• By Train: Puducherry Railway station is at 2 km.
• By Road:The beach is 3 km from Pondicherry Bus Stand.

RAMAKRISHNA BEACH, VISHAKAPATNAM The Ramakrishna beach is a beautiful spot for relaxation and pleasure is a natural beautic scene. There is an imposing Kali Temple near this beach. The aquarium here is an added attraction. The roaring sounds of sea gives enormous pleasure. How to Reach : Ramakrishna Beach is located at a distance of 18 km from the Visakhapatnam International Airport. Ramakrishna Beach is located at a distance of 5 km from the Visakhapatnam Railway Station. Ramakrishna Beach is located at a distance of 5 km from the RTC complex. People can reach the destination by bus, auto or cab.
